name: Assault on Karach VR
description:
A Entry for the /r/Vive Summer Game Jam.

This is a vr stealth game based on the concept of rts style commands, it has 3 full levels, a full stealth system with detection and combat and a full suite of programmer art.

Trailer:

Controls:

1) Hover the right controller over the board,

2) Now move your hand over a point that your character (the blue guy) can see.

3) Pull the right trigger and your character will begin walking.

4) rinse and repeat.
